section.title: Code Editor
section.para: Blue uses the Netbeans Code Editor library for editing code. The editor is customized depending on where you are in the application, but there are common features shared. Some things which are available are:

listitem.para: Line Numbering (enabled globally in program settings)
Popup Menu (use right-mouse click) with additional options

section.para: You can adjust colors, fonts, and other settings within Blue's Program Options.
